purpose: The email announces the IEEE Annual Congress on Artificial Intelligence of Things (IEEE AIoT 2024) scheduled for July 24–26, 2024, in Melbourne, Australia. It provides important dates for paper submissions, notifications of acceptance, and final manuscript submissions. The conference aims to bring together stakeholders in AI and IoT to discuss innovative solutions and collaborations. It also invites authors to submit original papers on various topics related to AIoT, with details on submission formats and review processes.
evidence_sentences: IEEE Annual Congress on Artificial Intelligence of Things (IEEE AIoT 2024)

IEEE AIoT 2024 aims at bringing together interested parties (universities, research centers, industries and stakeholders) from around the world working in the fields of AI and Internet of Things to exchange opinions, discuss brand-new ideas, developing innovative and emerging solutions, and establishing new collaborations.
Authors are cordially invited to submit their original papers within the eHealth area.
The submitted manuscripts shall be prepared in LaTeX or Word using the official IEEE templates.
